title: Open Tues 6:45-7pm,1BR/1BA,Skylight,Sh deck Yard(948 South Van Ness)
posting_body: Top, third floor 1BR/1BA apartment in the Inner Mission.
Floors are hardwood except in kitchen and bath.
Gas wall heaters in living room and bedroom.
Apartment is entered through a long hallway with a wall of perforated bricks between the hallway and the kitchen alongside it.
Kitchen includes a gas stove and has room for a modest dining arrangement.
Hallway opens into the living room.
The bedroom is behind the living room and faces the yard with a wall-width bank of high windows.
Bedroom closet is a large walk-in located in the living room.
The building has a front, concrete deck one floor above street level with BBQ.
The yard is somewhat overgrown but has potential, should you be interested.
Location is South Van Ness between 20th and 21st streets.
There is a wide selection of cafés, restaurants and shops in the immediate neighborhood, from 20th to 18th streets on Mission and Valencia.
Bus lines 12, 14 and 49 are within easy walking distance.
Building is equidistant from 16th and 24th street BART stations at four blocks.
Several other bus lines are also within the four-block range.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
